  • 4.27. umbra.globals.runtimeGlobals

4.27. umbra.globals.runtimeGlobals¶

RuntimeGlobals.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines Umbra package runtime globals through the RuntimeGlobals class.

Others:

4.27.1. Classes¶

class umbra.globals.runtimeGlobals.RuntimeGlobals[source]¶

Defines Umbra package runtime constants.
